channel.title: Ubuntu on Zen
channel.description: Recent content in Ubuntu on Zen

item.title: Ubuntu重装
item.description: #-2 vi ~/.bashrc alias vb='vi ~/.bashrc' alias sb='source ~/.bashrc' alias dow='cd /home/pen/Downloads' alias doc='cd /home/pen/Documents' alias af='sudo apt -f install' alias au='sudo apt update' alias arm='sudo apt autoremove' #mysql alias m9527='/apps/svr/mysql/bin/mysql -udba --socket=/tmp/mysql9527.sock -plocaldba' alias sm9527='/apps/svr/mysql/bin/mysqld_safe --defaults-file=/apps/conf/mysql/mysql57_9527.cnf & >/dev/null' alias lm="ps aux | grep mysql " export XMODIFIERS="@im=fcitx" export PATH=$PATH:/apps/svr/mysql/bin #-1 apt换源 #北京的apt选择搜狐源，广东的apt选择网易源 #但是要提防换源可能导致apt resource里的依赖库版本过高，以至于很多软件无法正常安装 sudo cp /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.bak sudo echo '' > /etc/apt/sources.list && sudo vi /etc/apt/sources.list deb http://mirrors.
